entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 1:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
